long_description: Designed to keep your food cool and fresh, the REI Lunch Stash is tall to provide ample capacity and square so it can slip easily into a backpack or tote bag. Roll-top closure becomes a handle when it's buckled. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof, PVC-free and easy to wipe clean. The REI Lunch Stash has an outer zip pocket for utensils and napkins.
short_description: Designed to keep your food cool and fresh, the REI Lunch Stash is tall to provide ample capacity and square so it can slip easily into a backpack or tote bag.
